text:
What should behaviour on this test be?

  <target name="condition-empty">
    <condition property="condition-empty"/>
    <echo>${condition-empty}</echo>
  </target>  

Should it be something more meaningful than
[condition] Error in class org.apache.tools.ant.taskdefs.ConditionTask

BUILD FAILED
D:\Java\Ant\jakarta-ant\src\etc\testcases\taskdefs\condition.xml:20: 
java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException
